revised_title: Isotope Shifts in Neodymium I Spectrum: A Reexamination of the Existing Classification
tldr: The authors investigated isotope shifts in the NdI spectrum using a Fabry-Perot spectrometer and a hollow cathode tube. They examined the existing classification of the spectrum and provided new data for further research. The study confirmed the inversion of the odd-even staggering phenomenon for the first time and revealed the odd isotopes' hyperfine structures in one of the lines.
